scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const dir = 'dist'; if (!fs.existsSync(dir)) process.exit(0); fs.readdirSync(dir).forEach(file => { const filePath = path.join(dir, file); fs.statSync(filePath).isDirectory() ? fs.rmSync(filePath, { recursive: true }) : fs.unlinkSync(filePath); }); console.log('Cleared dist directory');"
scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm run build
